radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse leptomeningeal enhancement and right parasagittal cortical enhancement.
Several enlarged lymph nodes in the mediastinum.
Symmetric T2-hyperintense white matter lesions involving the middle cerebellar peduncle and cerebellar hemispheres associated with diffuse brain atrophy.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Cognitive deficits progressed rapidly in one year, motor symptoms remained unchanged.
